name: Enevo Oy
membership: Enevo Oy's subsidiary company Enevo UK is a member of the APSE in UK: http://www.apse.org.uk/apse/
goal: Efficiency for managing the raw material supply chain in the waste and recycling industry
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Environment, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: Enevo is actively working with its customers to accelerate shift towards circular economy and thus Enevo is following the Circular Economy Package initiative of EU.
